message: A failed attempt to access invalid user $user$ was made from $ip$.
example: Sep 28 20:54:59 ... sshd[166101]: Disconnected from invalid user $user$ $ip$ port ... [preauth]

message: A failed attempt to access invalid user '$user$' was made from $ip$.
example: Sep 28 21:12:00 ... sshd[166101]: Connection closed by invalid user $user$ $ip$ port ... [preauth]

message: A failed attempt to access user '$user$' was made from $ip$.
example: Sep 28 21:13:06 ... sshd[...]: Connection closed by authenticating user $user$ $ip$ port ... [preauth]
Sep 28 19:47:33 ... sshd[...]: Accepted publickey for $user$ from $ip$ port ... ssh2: ED25519 SHA256:...
Sep 28 19:47:28 ... sshd[...]: Disconnected from user $user$ $ip$ port ...
